post:
KernelVPS delivers affordable enterprise level DDOS Protection in the Asian-Pacific region which can be customized as per your requirements so you don’t have to ever again for resources you will never use, making it accessible for projects of any scale.

All KernelVPS virtual servers are highly reliable with lightning fast speeds hosted on latest Intel Processors and NVMe SSD Drives backed with an Enterprise level Layer4 + Layer7 DDOS Protection and a 1Gbps Uplink with 99.5% uptime SLA. Along with our lucrative control panel with ample customisation options, our support team will strive to deliver a flawless user experience. In case you are dissatisfied with our services we offer a 3-day money back guarantee if we do not meet our promises.

Website: www.kernelvps.com

Enterprise level Layer4 + Layer7 DDOS Protection in Asia || Customizable SSD KVM VPS|| VPS Instantly Deployed || Upload Custom ISOs || Daily Offshore Backup as Addon || Free IPv6 Addresses || VPS Manager with API

- 1024MB RAM

- 20GB NVMe SSD Storage
- 500GB transfer
- 1Gbps DDOS Protected uplink
- 1x IPv4
- $10/month
